values: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then everything changed when the Overtime happened.
Only the S1mple, master of all four tilts, could stop them. But when his team needed him most, he choked.
A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Tilter, a chairbender named JDM,
and although his tilting skills are great, he still has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone.
But I believe JDM can save NA.
Jebaited KAPPA OUTDATED Jebaited POGCHAMP OVERRATED Jebaited LONG HAVE WE WAITED Jebaited NOW WE JEBAITED Jebaited
